data.title: UEFA Euro 2024 TV Coverage & Channel List (Wordwide)
data.meta_description: Discover where to watch Euro 2024 with our comprehensive guide on broadcasting rights, TV channel list and radio coverage.
data.text:
Get ready for UEFA Euro 2024, a big football event happening in June and July 2024. This time, we’ve got 24 national teams from Europe playing, and the games are going to be in Germany.

Excited to watch it? Whether you want to catch the action on your TV, hear it on the radio, or stream it on your phone, we’ve got you covered. We’ll tell you where you can watch or listen to the matches.

EURO 2024 Global Broadcasting Partners

Euro 2024 will be broadcasted worldwide through a variety of channels and streaming services. Here’s a breakdown by region:

Europe

United Kingdom: The matches will be shown on BBC and ITV. Both channels will provide extensive coverage, ensuring fans don’t miss a moment of the action.

Germany: ARD and ZDF are the official broadcasters, offering comprehensive coverage of all the games.

France: TF1 and M6 will be broadcasting the matches, bringing every thrilling moment to French audiences.

Spain: RTVE will cover the tournament, providing both TV and online streaming options.

Italy: RAI holds the broadcasting rights, ensuring Italian fans can follow their team closely.

North America

United States: FOX Sports and FuboTV will broadcast the games. FOX will provide English-language coverage, while TelevisaUnivision will cater to Spanish-speaking audiences through channels like Univision and TUDN.

Canada: TSN and TVA Sports are set to broadcast the matches, offering both English and French coverage.

Latin America

Brazil: Globo and SporTV will be the go-to channels for all Euro 2024 matches.

Argentina: DirectTV Sports will provide comprehensive coverage of the tournament.

Asia

India: Sony Pictures Networks will broadcast the matches across their various channels and streaming platforms.

China: CCTV and iQIYI will bring the tournament to Chinese football fans.

Middle East and North Africa

MENA Region: beIN Sports holds the exclusive rights, offering extensive coverage in both Arabic and English.

Africa

Sub-Saharan Africa: SuperSport will broadcast the games, ensuring that fans across the continent can enjoy the tournament.

Oceania

Australia: Optus Sport will be the exclusive broadcaster, providing extensive live coverage of all matches.

In-Flight and International Waters

For those traveling or at sea during the tournament, IMG’s Sport 24 channel will provide live coverage on major airlines and cruise ships, ensuring you don’t miss any of the action even when you’re on the move​

How to Stream Euro 2024 Live Online?

For those who prefer streaming, several options are available:

FuboTV: Offers a comprehensive sports package including Euro 2024. It’s available on smart TVs, streaming devices, and online platforms.

ViX: TelevisaUnivision’s streaming service will provide Spanish-language coverage of select matches.

FOX Sports App: Allows users with a TV subscription to stream matches live.

SonyLIV: In India, Sony’s streaming service will offer live coverage of the tournament.

Follow our comprehensive guide to stream Euro 2024 online from anywhere.

Where to Listen on Radio?

For those who prefer to listen to the matches on the radio, there are several options:

United Kingdom: BBC Radio 5 Live will provide live commentary for all matches.

United States: SiriusXM FC will broadcast live commentary of Euro 2024 matches.

Canada: TSN Radio will offer live coverage of the tournament.

Australia: ABC Grandstand will provide live radio commentary.

Complete List of EURO 2024 TV Channel Rights

Euro 2024 is going to be a big deal all over the world. Lots of TV and radio stations have got the rights to broadcast the games in different places. This means no matter where you are, you can watch the big tournament.

Let’s take a complete look at who’s broadcasting Euro 2024, so you know where to tune in.
